name: ThreadSphere
desc: Niche community platform. JS + Firebase SPA with login, comments, filters. Real-time Firestore data updates.

name: PayOrbit
desc: EdTech mentor payout system. React + Firebase. Admin panel, session tracking, receipts, secure messaging, audit logs.

name: Farm To Kitchen
desc: Farm-to-table marketplace. Roles: Farmer and Consumer. Cart, Checkout, Weather API, AI Suggestions. Stack: React, Tailwind CSS, Firebase/Supabase.

name: Gemini Chat Widget
desc: Persistent chatbot with Google Gemini API. Typing animations, assistant/user roles, localStorage sync. Stack: React, Context API.

name: Optimized Map Application
desc: Real-time location, search, routing. Performance optimized with React.memo, useMemo, useCallback. APIs: Google Maps, OpenWeather (optional).

name: Redux Toolkit Shopping Cart
desc: Add/Remove products, total calculation. Stack: Vite + Redux Toolkit.

name: MindTrack
desc: Student wellness journal. Log daily mood, sleep, study, stress. Reflections with markdown + heatmap. Stack: React + Vite.
